content: i have chosen to still include the smallest size for several reasons even if they may never get worn these socks may serve a purpose a memento for those involved and may be a way of letting your loved ones in the nicu know that you are thinking of them another reason is that unfortunately not all preemies get to come home and as much as it hurts to write this sentence down if someone wants to bury their child in handknit socks i think patterns need to be available finally if you are knitting for someone with a preemie in the nicu please also consider helping out with everyday essentials if you can help out with food walking the dog mowing the lawn or some other household task that is likely to be difficult to tend to you will probably be forever remembered as a truly
